Attill/Luzbel/Shivah/BlackFortress::

Attilla and Luzbel walked towards the base, Luzbel still was carring 
Panzer. They were in a dark tunnel that lead to BlackFortress.

"Attilla"said Luzbel

"What?"answer the male

"Check if the defences are up"

After Attilla cheked up he said "Yup, They are up, what will we do 
now??"

"Well, send a message to Shivah and tell him that we're on the way... 
with a guest"

Attilla send the message using a secret frecuency and Shivah typed 
some buttons using a computer that was near of him and answered, 
using the same frecuency that Attilla used, Shivah said that 
BlackFortress's main computer started to check if existed any enemy 
around the base, and soon they would have the answer. Shivah said 
too, that in case that any enemy wasn't around, the lava shield would 
be down in few minutes and their commands would be wait him or Kali 
in Area 5 inside the Predacon Fortress. While BlackFortress Main 
computer was looking for enemies signatures on ground, the males 
continued walking towards the base with Panzer. Suddenly Luzbel spoke 
again:

"I think that you should take your dart-gun and be ready" said 
Luzbel"Just in case"

"Ok"answered Attilla while he took the dart-gun "I'm ready to shot if 
the cat wakes up"




--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> ZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZ
